Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $305.00 - $215.80
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:11:49 UTC – Details)


Carhartt SeatSaver seat covers from Covercraft are the solution to the problem of keeping the seats in your truck or SUV clean and protected from daily use and weekend adventures. Made from durable, duck-weave fabric, these custom-fit seat covers protect your seats from dirt, mud, grime, spills and more. Featuring Rain Defender technology, a durable water repellency finish is added to the fabric to make it highly water resistant. Combine these features with the custom fitment and classic Carhartt styling, you get seat covers that look great and protect your seats from whatever you throw at them.
Compatible vehicle(s): 2017-2018 Chevrolet Silverado 1500, 2019 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 LD (old body style), 2017-2019 Chevrolet Silverado 2500/3500, 2017-2018 GMC Sierra 1500, 2019 GMC Sierra 1500 Limited (old body style), 2017-2019 GMC Sierra 2500/3500
Compatible seat type: 1st row 40/20/40-split bench seat, with adjustable headrests, with fold-down console/cupholder with lid, with storage under center seat, with seat airbags (headrest covers and console cover included)
Custom-patterned to fit your specific vehicle
Classic Duck-Weave Carhartt fabric for durability
Highly water-resistant; Protection from dirt, dust & spills; Machine washable
Ideal for protection from work, hunting, fishing, pets and anything else you can throw at them
Easy installation and removal

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers

Don't let the good looks fool you. These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit. Our Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are designed for heavy-duty protection for work, hunting, fishing, pets, and anything else you throw at them. Not only is the fabric super durable, but it is highly water-resistant to bead away any moisture, spills, or drool from your pups.

Read more

Variety of Seat Seat Styles and Configurations

Custom Patterned Seat Cover

Our Carhartt Seat Covers are custom-patterned for a perfect fit. Enter your Year/Make/Model details and you should see all patterns available for your vehicle.

Make Your Seats Carhartt Tough

Our Carhartt SeatSaver Seat Covers are designed to fit great while being easy on/off seat covers with the same amazing rugged durability you expect from Carhartt.

All Applicable Headrests & Armrests Included

Our Carhartt Seat Covers not only cover the entire backside of the seat on front seat covers we also have rear map pockets built-in so that you don't lose any much-needed storage space.

Read more

Authentic Carhartt Products

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers are the trusted, durable, and dependable design you know and love from Carhartt.

Pillow to Secure Cover

Each seat cover includes a pillow tab to secure the cover. No slipping, sliding or refitting this seat cover thanks to the securing pillow.

Carhartt Styling

Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are the ideal seat cover when your primary focus is a great fit and superior protection paired with a classic nod to the Carhartt clothing you have come to love.

Carhartt Triple Stitched Seams

These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:11:49 UTC - Details)

Price: $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:54:39 UTC – Details)

From the brand

AOOG has always insisted on providing cost-effective car seat covers. Not only does it provide superior protection and meets versatile needs, it also adds comfort to your drive.Amazing details, clever design. Each AOOG seat cover has its own set of interior styles, details and premium materials. Discover the saddle that fits your vehicle.

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

F150 Leather Seat Covers

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: High-Grade Leatherette materials Protect the original car seat from damage, Durable Wear-Resistant Waterproof Easy to Clean. Equipped with thick, premium High-Density Foam to create top resilience for maximum comfort during your drive.
PROTECTS & LUXURIOUS: These are the perfect seat covers for your car. Our seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle. High-quality artificial leather and excellent appearance design, also refreshing the look of your interior.
STYLE DESIGN: Our universal fit seat covers with a unique visual design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags. The anchor attached to the elastic strap can also provide firm reinforcement.
EASY TO INSTALL: For your convenience, installation instructions are included in the product package, and we also provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.
UNIVERSAL FIT: Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles, including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. If you are not sure whether the vehicle is suitable for you, please contact us in time. Our customer service team will always online to assist you.

Read more

Details:
  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Lined with high-density foam for maximum comfort.
  • Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.
  • Sideless design compatible with side armrests and airbags.
  • Easy to Install within minutes.

AOOG Leather Car Seat Covers Set – Waterproof Universal Car Seat Protector

AOOG Car Seat Covers can protect the original seat, give your car seat a new look.

These are the perfect seat covers, the best investment for your new vehicle, We design our products to ensure comfort is our top priority.

  • High-quality leatherette to provide valuable protection and luxurious comfort for almost any car or truck.
  • The entire seat, backrest and headrest are lined with high-density foam to provide maximum comfort during long-distance travel and daily commuting.
  • What’s In The Package?
  • 2 pcs Front Seat Covers + 2 pcs Front Headrest Covers.
  • Adjustable Back Seat Covers (for full set only).
  • A Hardware Bag of Steel Hooks and Round Plates for Install.
  • An Installation Manual.

Read more

Airbag Compatible

The airbag has enough room to stretch and will never be blocked. The front seat back has pockets for the things you want to put.

High-Quality Material

AOOG Seat Covers are made of multiple layers of high-quality materials to provide maximum comfort during your driving.

Breathable Holes

The main part of AOOG Seat Covers has Breathable Holes to ensure breathability during use and increase your comfortable experience

Five Colors

We provide a variety of colors for your choice

Read more

AOOG faux leather car seat cover are fit for most sedan, truck and suv

  • Fit Acura: Integra/Audi: A3 A4 A5 A6, A7, A8, Q5, Q7
  • Fit BMW: Series 1, Series 2, Series 3, Series 4, Series 5, Series 6, Series 7, Series 8, Mini Cooper, X1, X3, X4, X5, X6/Buick: Electra, Regal, Encore, LaCrosse, Enclave, Envision
  • Fit Chevrolet: SSR/Chevrolet: SSR, Cavalier, Malibu, Equinox, Traverse, Caprice, Impala/Cadillac: CTS, SRX/Chrysler : 300, Town & Country
  • Fit Dodge: Charger, Durango, Journey/Ford: Fiesta, Focus, Escape, Fusion, Mustang, Edge, Explorer
  • Fit Honda: City, Civic, CR-V, Pilot/Hummer：H2, H3/Hyundai: Elantra
  • Fit Jeep: Cherokee, Compass, Grand Cherokee, Grand Wagoneer/Kia: Sportage
  • Fit Land Rover: Range Rover Evoque, Range Rover/Lincoln: MKC, MKX, Continental, Navigator
  • Fit Mazda: 3/Mercedes-Benz: A Class, B Class, C Class, G Class, GLC, GLE, E Class, S Class
  • Fit Nissan: Sentra, X-Trail, Altima, Maxima, Frontier, Pathfinder
  • Fit Porsche: Macan/Toyota: Corolla, RAV4, Camry, Highlander, 4Runner, Land Cruiser/Volkswagen: Golf, Tiguan, Passat, CC, Touareg

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $11.13 - $9.90
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:46:45 UTC – Details)


Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

4.5

Carhartt Seat Saver seat covers from Cover craft are the solution to the problem of keeping the seats in your truck or SUV clean and protected from daily use and weekend adventures. Made from durable, duck-weave fabric, these custom-fit seat covers protect your seats from dirt, mud, grime, spills and more. Featuring Rain Defender technology, a durable water repellency finish is added to the fabric to make it highly water resistant. Combine these features with the custom fitment and classic Carhartt styling, you get seat covers that look great and protect your seats from whatever you throw at them.
First row bucket seats for select RAM models, gravel. Classic Duck-Weave Carhartt fabric for durability
Custom-made for your specific year, make and model seats
Easy installation and removal
Machine washable. Headrest covers included, center console cover not included
Seat configuration: Front row bucket seats with adjustable headrests with seat airbags



Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers

Don't let the good looks fool you. These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit. Our Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are designed for heavy-duty protection for work, hunting, fishing, pets, and anything else you throw at them. Not only is the fabric super durable, but it is highly water-resistant to bead away any moisture, spills, or drool from your pups.

Read more

Variety of Seat Seat Styles and Configurations




Custom Patterned Seat Cover

Our Carhartt Seat Covers are custom-patterned for a perfect fit. Enter your Year/Make/Model details and you should see all patterns available for your vehicle.

Make Your Seats Carhartt Tough

Our Carhartt SeatSaver Seat Covers are designed to fit great while being easy on/off seat covers with the same amazing rugged durability you expect from Carhartt.

All Applicable Headrests & Armrests Included

Our Carhartt Seat Covers not only cover the entire backside of the seat on front seat covers we also have rear map pockets built-in so that you don't lose any much-needed storage space.

Read more


Authentic Carhartt Products

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers are the trusted, durable, and dependable design you know and love from Carhartt.


Pillow to Secure Cover

Each seat cover includes a pillow tab to secure the cover. No slipping, sliding or refitting this seat cover thanks to the securing pillow.


Carhartt Styling

Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are the ideal seat cover when your primary focus is a great fit and superior protection paired with a classic nod to the Carhartt clothing you have come to love.


Carhartt Triple Stitched Seams

These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit.

….
Christmas Decorations for Porch: cute covers for christmas lights has red nose snowman feature & blushed cheek and lovely smile, it is full of holiday atmosphere, creates a welcome entrance for garages, patios and any other entryways.
Easy to Install: Just simply attach the strap to a coach lantern or outdoor porch light, the decoration job is done. porch light cover is easy to place and remove. With its upgraded elasticity and thicker strap, you don’t need to worry about the lampshade will fall off.
Attractive Appearance: Christmas light covers are definitely an icon attached to an outdoor light, it’s in good light transmission, lamp’s light will become much softer and beautiful through them, the glowing light warmly greets family and friends & joyfulness.

Motor Trend Waterproof Car Seat Covers for Front Seats – Padded Neoprene with Two-Tone Stitching, Easy to Install Automotive Seat Covers, Universal Fit for Cars Trucks Vans and SUVs, Gray Stitching. Universal fit design for pick-up trucks, hatchback sedans and most other types of car, truck, van & SUV. Also works great as a baby, pet, or dog seat cover. Perfect car accessories for rideshare drivers too!
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior. Bucket seats dimensions-Back Height-2 feet. Width-1 feet 9 inch. Bottom Length(fr. the back)-1 feet 6 inch Width-1 feet 10 inch
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.



Motor Trend SpillGuard Waterproof Car Seat Covers

Front Seats Only

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.

Modern Design

Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Breathable materials for maximum comfort during your commute.
  • Waterproof neoprene foam lining repels water and other liquids.
  • Universal Fit for Most Vehicles.
  • Easy to Install.

Read more




Refresh the Look of Your Interior

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Easily refresh the look of your interior in minutes.

Sideless Designs for Built-In Armrests

Our universal seat covers are fully compatible with side airbags and armrests. Universal fit for most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUV. Please check dimensions before installation.

Waterproof Neoprene Lining

Have peace of mind knowing that your front seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. Waterproof neoprene foam lines the inside of our covers to provide maximum protection.

Made for Auto Enthusiasts

Motor Trend offers only high-quality premium products designed to protect and enhance your car or truck.

FH Group got you covered! Our premium cloth car seat covers not only provide the best protection for your car’s upholstery against any type of mess but they also enhance the looks of your car’s interior. No need to worry anymore about spills, stains, mud, or anything damaging your original car seats because this car seat protector got your back. Every car seat cover we make is built with high-quality, durable materials that will protect your car’s upholstery at all times. We offer automotive seat covers in numerous fabrics, colors, and designs, so you can easily find the seat cover for cars that fits your style the most. We have car seat covers for women, for men and for everyone. Our auto seat covers are compatible with most sedans, SUVs, and vans’ front seats thanks to the universal low back seat cover design that delivers the snug fit you’re looking for, only if the front seats’ headrest is removable. Also, because safety is one of our main goals, this front set of cover for car seats is airbag compatible (officially tested!). We understand messes happen, that’s why these waterproof seat covers for cars are convenient for any type of driver. FH Group car seat covers are a great car interior accessory for your vehicle. We have it all: car seat covers for SUV, car seat covers for autos, car seat covers for vans, you name it!
[UNIVERSAL FIT] Our semi-customized car seat cover fits most vehicles better than other universal covers in the market. Our design has hook-and-loop attachments for a snug fit, straps in the bottom seat, and more, for an almost-customized look
[HIGH-QUALITY AND DURABLE MATERIALS] Our premium cloth car seat covers full set is built with 3 layers of cloth, 3mm padding and mesh fabric, making our covers a reliable and durable car seat protector.
[WASHABLE CAR SEAT COVERS] These carseat covers are machine washable! Simply remove the car seat cover, machine wash, and air dry.
[AIRBAG COMPATIBLE] Our front seat car seat covers feature a special stitching on the side allowing airbag deployment. It’s officially tested, making our covers a reliable car seat protector.
[FRONT SEAT STORAGE POCKET] The front bucket seat covers feature a handy map pocket on the back of the seat so you can store everything you need and have easy access to it.
[CUSTOMIZABLE REAR COVER] This cover is compatible with any split bench and becomes 2 individual covers with the extra mesh piece. This cover features zippers providing full access to the middle armrest. Elongate cover by adding an extra piece.
[AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS] FH Group’s car seats come in 10 different colors, so you can perfectly match your car’s style and aesthetic.

Premium Seat Covers, Auto Accessories and More!

At FH Group we offer a wide variety of automotive products designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Read more

Travel Master Series Seat Covers

Package Includes:

2 Front low back bucket covers.

1 Rear backrest cover.

1 Rear bottom bench cover.

5 Separate headrest covers.

1 Bag of snaps.

Combo packs will include additional products.

Works with Split Bench

Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches

Travel Master Seat Covers

Available in several different colors. Fabric disperses heat to keep you cool and comfortable.

Premium Polyester Fabric

An eye-catching pattern adorns the center panel of this cover, adding a graceful touch to our high quality fabric.

Read more

Compatibility and Installation

Compatibility and Buying Tips

Due to installation requirement, please ensure your headrests can be detached before buying this set.This set is compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

Dimensions

Semi-Universal to fit a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Installation

Installation is simple with our easy instruction videos available on our website. This product is only compatible with vehicles that have detachable or adjustable headrests.

Product Features:

  • Airbag compatible – special stitching on the side allows airbag deployment. Officially tested!
  • Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches
  • Semi-customized to fit most vehicles. Will not interfere with heated seats.

Read more



Unique Flat Cloth Seat Covers Complete Set For Most Sedans, SUVs, and Trucks
Highback Style Neoprene Full Set Airbag Safe
Raised Edge Multi-Use Cargo Tray For Home and Auto
FH Group Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover
Style: Flat Cloth Pattern. Neoprene Highback. Cargo Tray. Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover.
Feature: Our high quality fabric with 3mm of breathable foam backing is soft to the touch and disperses heat, keeping you comfortable and cool on even the hottest summer days. These neoprene seat covers are waterproof, stain proof, and life proof to protect you from all kinds of disasters. Waterproof Neoprene with Non-Slip Backing. Rear seat cover designed to accommodate 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, and 40/20/40 split benches. Our premium all-weather cargo tray will deliver the ultimate protection for your trunk. Heavy duty rubber material protects your trunk against spills and messy cargo and a specially finished surface keeps your haul from shifting around. Is your steering wheel starting to fade and wear, direct sunlight and hot temperatures can damage car interiors. The FH Group Steering Wheel Cover is designed to protect your steering wheel, while adding a touch of class to your ride.
Package Included: 2 front low back bucket covers 1 rear backrest cover 1 rear bottom bench cover 4 separate headrest covers 1 bag of snaps. 2 bucket seat covers, 1 rear bench backrest cover, 1 rear bench bottom seat cover, 3 headrest covers. 1 Raised Edge Cargo Tray for Home and Auto. 1 Steering Wheel Cover.
Dimension: Semi-Universal. Semi-Universal. Available in 32″ and 40″ Sizes. Stretchable Silicone fits all vehicles from small sedans to Trucks and SUVs.
Cleaning Tips: Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Vaccuum or use soap and water. Air dry. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth.
Installation Tips: Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Simply place wherever needed! No installation Required. Easily slides over steering wheel.

About Us

FH Group International, Inc. is a manufacturer you can depend on and trust. Our mission is to exceed your expectations by providing a large selection of outstanding car accessories at affordable prices. We are constantly striving to provide our customers with the most efficient and friendly communications, smooth transactions, and speedy deliveries.

Price: $159.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

APOLOGY:

THE COLOUR WE CALL “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY NOT THE CORRECT COLOUR WHICH WE MADE A MISTAKE WHILE BUILDING THE LISTS. AND AS THE COLOUR BLANK COULD NEVER BE ALTERED SINCE BEEN SUBMITED. SO WE MAKE THE APOLOGY HERE AND THE “WHITE” IN “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY “CREAM”.WE ARE REALLY SORRY FOR THE MISTAKE WE HAVE MADE AND PROMISE WE WOULD BE MORE CAUTIOUS IN THE JOB COMING UP.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:

Effective Protection: Use High-quality leatherette as the surface of Cushions, waterproof, wear-resistant and easy to clean, can be cleaned by wet towel. Fashion Looking: Upgrade your vehicle instantly with this fashion looking and Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.Easy to Install: We provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.

THE PACKAGE INCLUDING:FRONT ROW COVER*2PCS, REAR ROW COVER*2PCS, INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION*1PC, INSTALLATION FITTINGS*1 PACK

FAUX LEATHER UNIVERSAL CAR SEAT COVER

J010 BLACK AND CREAM

J010 PINK

J010 BLACK

DETAILS

THE BACK COVER OF THE FRONT SEAT IS FULLY WRAPPED AND PERFECTLY PROTECTED.

WE USE SOME SPECIAL MATERIALS IN THE SIDE COVER TO MAKE SURE THERE WOULD NO EFFECTS ON THE WORK OF THE AIRBAGS.

WE HAVE BUCKLES EXPOSED IN THE REAR SEAT AND THE EDGE OF THE BACK SEAT IS WELL WRAPPED AS WELL.

THE FAUX LEATHER IN THIS ITEM IS DURABLE AND EASY TO BE MAINTAINED IN DAILY LIFE.THERE IS A BACK POCKET IN EACH FRONT SEAT COVER WHICH IS SO CONVENIENT IN OUR CAR LIFE.

Suitable for 99% cars, such as Sedans, Hatchbacks, SUV, Crossovers, Pickup Trucks, Crew Cab, Vans, Ev.
The Set includes front and back seats covers,seat heads covers,airbag and seat belt compatible
The PVC leather is quite wear-resistant and water-proof . If the covers get dirty, you can wipe it clean by wet towel easily.
It usually takes 10-25 minutes to complete the installation without the tool.
Makes your car more elegant and neat. Protect the original car seat.

APOLOGY:

THE COLOUR WE CALL “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY NOT THE CORRECT COLOUR WHICH WE MADE A MISTAKE WHILE BUILDING THE LISTS. AND AS THE COLOUR BLANK COULD NEVER BE ALTERED SINCE BEEN SUBMITED. SO WE MAKE THE APOLOGY HERE AND THE “WHITE” IN “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY “CREAM”.WE ARE REALLY SORRY FOR THE MISTAKE WE HAVE MADE AND PROMISE WE WOULD BE MORE CAUTIOUS IN THE JOB COMING UP.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:

  • Effective Protection: Use High-quality leatherette as the surface of Cushions, waterproof, wear-resistant and easy to clean, can be cleaned by wet towel. Fashion Looking: Upgrade your vehicle instantly with this fashion looking and Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.
  • Easy to Install: We provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.

THE PACKAGE INCLUDING:FRONT ROW COVER*2PCS, REAR ROW COVER*2PCS, INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION*1PC, INSTALLATION FITTINGS*1 PACK
